"Transforming life experience into career opportunity." This program is focused on assisting under employed and unemployed people by providing foundational training and experience as we prepare them for a career in Project Management consulting with York Solutions.

York Solutions is a full service IT consulting firm in Minneapolis. At York, we gauge success first and foremost by the true value we create for our clients and consultants. In this constantly evolving business climate we strive to be a trusted adviser to both our clients and consultants. York consults with the executive decision-making team to help you determine the most appropriate model to adopt, depending upon your current business needs. York’s flexible and customized solution provides you access to the most appropriate resources at any given time.

To act as a counselor, friend, and advocate to troubled children and teens. To run and lead groups, activities, and help plan events for this children. To administer and carry out discipline, help with school work, and supervise/help with everyday activities and needs of the children.

To facilitate The Corridor Business Journal's  "Coolest Places to Work in the Corridor" by contacting nominated companies, formating and distributing employer and employee surveys, collect data, create and format data reports for each company, and assist in scoring each company. To serve as the point of contact for all companies participating in "Coolest Places to Work in the Corridor".

To assist the HR Director with many functions including; updating employee files, write policies and create an employee wellness booklet, complete reference checks, create and administer employee review surveys, create and administer employee engagement surveys, worked to help establish ESCO University, and redefine career paths. I also worked with ESCO’s recruiter to better understand the recruiting process.
